products.title: Professional Feeding Tongs
products.description: Precision stainless steel tongs for safe and accurate feeding of your isopods. Features soft-grip handles and fine tips.

products.title: Substrate Mixing Tool Set
products.description: Complete set of tools for mixing and preparing isopod substrate. Includes rake, scoop, and mixing paddle.

products.title: Digital Humidity Gauge
products.description: High-precision digital humidity meter for monitoring isopod habitat conditions.

products.title: Premium Rubber Ducky Isopods (5 Pack)
products.description: Rare and adorable rubber ducky isopods, known for their unique yellow coloration and friendly temperament. Perfect for collectors!

products.title: Dairy Cow Isopods (10 Pack)
products.description: Popular dairy cow isopods with striking black and white patterns. Excellent cleanup crew and very prolific breeders.

products.title: Powder Blue Isopods (5 Pack)
products.description: Beautiful powder blue isopods with a stunning pale blue coloration. Peaceful and easy to care for.

products.title: Panda King Isopods (3 Pack)
products.description: Rare panda king isopods with distinctive black and white markings. A must-have for serious collectors.

products.title: Bio-Active Terrarium Kit
products.description: Complete setup for a thriving isopod habitat. Includes substrate, cork bark, moss, and leaf litter.

products.title: LED Habitat Light System
products.description: Advanced LED lighting system with day/night cycle programming. Perfect for planted terrariums.

products.title: Premium Substrate Mix
products.description: Professional-grade substrate mix specially formulated for isopods. Rich in organic matter and minerals.
